to many people seem to assume that self presevation is honor to 
defend isnt honour uts the right to exist. Duty is however you 
personally feel u will do what is expected and demanded of you in a 
time of need.Loyalty to have a cause thatt your loyal to that is true 
honour. To many people think samurai are super human honourable 
dashing chracters and that just doesnt exist. akira kurosawas films 
aimed at showing this. True honour comes from within the fight for 
what you feel is right not some rich war lord that sends you to war 
to inrich his estates. Anyway im in kyoto in two months ne one got ne 
good sites to see
